verses.name: Psalms 37:22
verses.text: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.

verses.name: Psalms 37:23
verses.text: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way.

verses.name: Psalms 37:24
verses.text: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

verses.name: Psalms 37:25
verses.text: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

verses.name: Psalms 37:26
verses.text: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.

verses.name: Psalms 37:27
verses.text: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.
